name: PLASMA TORCH
description: Has bribed Rumble with a passing grade in exchange for access to her plasma torch (out of combat only unless installed).

name: TRACKING
description: SCRIMBO and the ghouls at Cabochon have compiled intel on the old, prewar research post at the glacier, known as Coldstar Outpost. This includes access and entry instructions and detailed info on its layout, although much of the intel may be outdated.

name: BOOSTED SERVOS
description:
Communications with the Pro-Aimbot elements within the Hegemony have netted a temporary upgrade to AIMBOT’s mech - boosted servos (immunity to slowed) to keep joints from freezing up from the cold.
DELAYED
This reserve was hastily loaded onboard and will take time to install on arrival

name: NHP ASSISTANT
description: With the help of HUBRIS, an investigation into the “stutter” effect felt across the colony has led to the discovery of subatomic particles embedded in organic tissue, likely a product of irradiation by the satellite. With this in mind, the team has developed [GHOST], an NHP designed to analyze the situation and assist in the upcoming mission.

name: AUGMENTATION
description:
Studies into practical application of [VAGRANT]-type technology have allowed MERLIN to upgrade his own body, altering his physical capabilities.
INCOMPLETE
This reserve is unfinished, and requires 1. More sophisticated coolant, and 2. Knowledge to complete installation.
